00040 /**
00041  * @file
00042  *
00043  * This file provides support for real time clocks on some boards
00044  *
00045  * <hr>$Revision: 73842 $<hr>
00046  *
00047  */
00048 
00049 #ifndef __CVMX_RTC_H__
00050 #define __CVMX_RTC_H__
00051 
00052 #include "cvmx-sysinfo.h"
00053 #include "cvmx-thunder.h"
00054 #include "cvmx-cn3010-evb-hs5.h"
00055 
00056 /**
00057  * Supported RTC options
00058  */
00059 typedef enum {
00060     CVMX_RTC_READ = 0x1,         /**< Device supports read access */
00061     CVMX_RTC_WRITE = 0x2,        /**< Device supports write access */
00062     CVMX_RTC_TIME_EPOCH = 0x10,  /**< Time stored as seconds from epoch */
00063     CVMX_RTC_TIME_CAL = 0x20,    /**< Time stored as calendar */
00064 } cvmx_rtc_options_t;
00065 
00066 /**
00067  * Return options supported by the RTC device
00068  *
00069  * @return Supported options, or 0 if RTC is not supported
00070  */
00071 static inline cvmx_rtc_options_t cvmx_rtc_supported()
00072 {
00073     static int supported = -1;
00074 
00075     if (supported < 0) {
00076         switch (cvmx_sysinfo_get()->board_type) {
00077         case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_THUNDER:
00078             supported = CVMX_RTC_READ | CVMX_RTC_WRITE | CVMX_RTC_TIME_EPOCH;
00079             break;
00080 
00081         case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_EBH3000:
00082         case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_CN3010_EVB_HS5:
00083             supported = CVMX_RTC_READ | CVMX_RTC_WRITE | CVMX_RTC_TIME_CAL;
00084             break;
00085 
00086         default:
00087             supported = 0;
00088             break;
00089         }
00090 
00091 #ifdef CVMX_RTC_DEBUG
00092         cvmx_dprintf("Board type: %s, RTC support: 0x%x\n", cvmx_board_type_to_string(cvmx_sysinfo_get()->board_type), supported);
00093 #endif
00094     }
00095 
00096     return (cvmx_rtc_options_t) supported;
00097 }
00098 
00099 /**
00100  * Read time from RTC device.
00101  *
00102  * Time is expressed in seconds from epoch (Jan 1 1970 at 00:00:00 UTC)
00103  *
00104  * @return Time in seconds or 0 if RTC is not supported
00105  */
00106 static inline uint32_t cvmx_rtc_read(void)
00107 {
00108     switch (cvmx_sysinfo_get()->board_type) {
00109     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_THUNDER:
00110         return cvmx_rtc_ds1374_read();
00111         break;
00112 
00113     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_EBH3000:
00114     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_CN3010_EVB_HS5:
00115         return cvmx_rtc_ds1337_read();
00116         break;
00117 
00118     default:
00119         return 0;
00120         break;
00121     }
00122 }
00123 
00124 /**
00125  * Write time to the RTC device
00126  *
00127  * @param time    Number of seconds from epoch (Jan 1 1970 at 00:00:00 UTC)
00128  *
00129  * @return Zero on success or device-specific error on failure.
00130  */
00131 static inline uint32_t cvmx_rtc_write(uint32_t time)
00132 {
00133     switch (cvmx_sysinfo_get()->board_type) {
00134     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_THUNDER:
00135         return cvmx_rtc_ds1374_write(time);
00136         break;
00137 
00138     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_EBH3000:
00139     case CVMX_BOARD_TYPE_CN3010_EVB_HS5:
00140         return cvmx_rtc_ds1337_write(time);
00141         break;
00142 
00143     default:
00144         return 0;
00145         break;
00146     }
00147 }
00148 
00149 #endif /* __CVMX_RTC_H__  */
